title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, June 5, 2020
description: On this day in 1851, the first words of “Uncle Tom’s Cabin” by Harriet Beecher Stowe were published, spreading the abolitionist cause to a newly receptive public.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1851, the first words of “Uncle Tom’s Cabin” by Harriet Beecher Stowe were published, spreading the abolitionist cause to a newly receptive public.
